headline: Test Article
author: SYSTEM
content:
# Main Heading (H1) ## Subheading (H2) ### Sub-Subheading (H3) ###### Tiny-Subheading (H6) This is a paragraph with **bold text**, *italic text*, and ***bold italic text***. You can also have ~~strikethrough text~~ like this. --- **Blockquote example:** > This is a blockquote. > > It can have multiple lines! --- **List examples:** - Item 1 - Item 2 - Subitem 2.1 - Subitem 2.2 - Item 3 1. First 2. Second 3. Third --- **Code examples:** Inline code: `const x = 5;` Multi-line code block: ```javascript function greet(name) { console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`); } greet('World'); ``` --- **Table example:** | Syntax | Description | |--------|-------------| | Header | Title | | Paragraph | Text | --- **Link and Image example:** - [Visit OpenAI](https://openai.com) - ![Example Image](https://imgs.search.brave.com/WuhLdiTdAGBhs0HplFkkSdZXNGK6Pyy3eySuoY7tS8s/rs:fit:860:0:0:0/g:ce/aHR0cHM6Ly9wcmV2/aWV3LnJlZGQuaXQv/am5odzRoZW02ejU5/MS5qcGc_YXV0bz13/ZWJwJnM9YTc0NWQz/OTYxZDc1ODMwMTUw/NDFjNDIxNWZiOGIy/NzEwNjliNTAxNg) --- **Horizontal Rule:** --- **HTML inside Markdown:**
